🔥Who are we looking for as $BOOM ambassadors?

$BOOM ambassador is like a friendly face spreading good vibes about $BOOM all over social media!

Are you a Twitter influencer, video creator, or reels enthusiast? Maybe you have a funny TikTok account dedicated to crypto? Or do you run a super useful Telegram trading channel?

We want people like you as $BOOM ambassadors!

✔️How do you become a $BOOM ambassador? Becoming a $BOOM ambassador is simple:

  • – You have a following of over 50k
  • – You occasionally share content about $BOOM.
  • – You’re excited to promote our big announcements.

Just share $BOOM content from time to time, and we’ll provide you with exclusive insider information to boost your posts.

❤️Fill out the form and we’ll get back to you for further discussion!

Why is it awesome to be a $BOOM ambassador?

As a $BOOM ambassador, you’ll enjoy special perks such as bonuses from our referral program and rewards from token distribution. You’re not just representing our brand; you’re sharing in the success of $BOOM.

Being an ambassador comes with even more benefits than being a $Boomie. You can combine both roles, maximizing the advantages of working with $BOOM! Plus, you’ll get invitations to all our events and conferences!

Join us today and be part of something GREAT!
